Metadata.Title: CVE-2025-22872 affecting package sriov-network-device-plugin for versions less than 3.6.2-9
Metadata.Description: CVE-2025-22872 affecting package sriov-network-device-plugin for versions less than 3.6.2-9. A patched version of the package is available.

Criterion.Comment: Package sriov-network-device-plugin is earlier than 3.6.2-9, affected by CVE-2025-22872
